<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the old merged/optimized IndexOperandHashMap is compatible with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the current IndexOperandHashMap. An operand hash may not be stable across</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different builds due to varying modules combined. To address this, we relax</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the hash check condition by comparing Const hash patterns instead of absolute</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// hash values. For example, let&#39;s assume we have three Consts located at idx1,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// idx3, and idx6, where their corresponding hashes are hash1, hash2, and hash1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the old merged map below:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   Old (Merged): &#91;(idx1, hash1), (idx3, hash2), (idx6, hash1)&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   Current: &#91;(idx1, hash1&#39;), (idx3, hash2&#39;), (idx6, hash1&#39;)&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the current function also has three Consts in the same locations,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with hash sequences hash1&#39;, hash2&#39;, and hash1&#39; where the first and third</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are the same as the old hash sequences, we consider them matched.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337" lineLink="#a507bf9056bce6ed68f4c1c14323e03a2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a507bf9056bce6ed68f4c1c14323e03a2">checkConstHashCompatible</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;IndexPair, stable&#95;hash&gt;</a> &amp;OldInstOpndIndexToConstHash,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;IndexPair, stable&#95;hash&gt;</a> &amp;CurrInstOpndIndexToConstHash) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It == CurrInstOpndIndexToConstHash.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
